participant_1.name: Raj
participant_1.personality: Passionate about technology and sports, Raj is focused and energetic. He enjoys sharing his interests with others.
participant_1.background: I am studying to be a computer programmer. I am a swim coach at my local pool. My favorite music genre is death metal. My family and I are from India.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is friendly and sociable, always looking to connect with others. She has a curious nature and enjoys learning new things.
participant_2.background: I am in college to become a nurse. I have blonde hair and blue eyes. I recently got an apartment with my best friend. I do not like chicken. I work at a bar at night to pay for college.
